CONTACT.CONTACT_PAGE_TITLE: We invite you to get in touch!
CONTACT.CONTACT_PAGE_TEXT: Whether you're looking for unique antiques, interested in selling valuable items, or have questions about our offerings, we're here to help. Simply fill out the contact form or reach out to us directly – we’ll be happy to assist and advise you. Our passion for antiques means we approach each client individually, ensuring a personalized experience every time.

OUR_OFFER_TEXT: We invite you to explore our collection and join us in the search for unique items that will become a part of your life.
WHO_WE_ARE: We are a small, family-owned business that passionately deals with antiques, especially porcelain. In our offer, you will find beautiful figurines, cups, and unique trinkets that will bring a touch of magic and history into your homes.
OUR_WORK: We source our treasures from fairs and auction houses across Europe. Each item we offer is carefully selected to ensure authenticity and the highest quality. We believe that antiques are not just decorative elements, but also carriers of memories and emotions.
APPROACH: As a family business, we strive to make every customer feel special. We provide a personalized approach and secure packaging for our shipments, so you can be confident that your purchases will arrive in perfect condition!
CUSTOMERS: The satisfaction of our customers is our highest value. Every opinion we receive is a valuable proof of trust and a source of motivation for further work. Thank you for all the warm words and we hope that our unique items will accompany you for many years.
CUSTOMERS_COMMENTS: Here we present you only selected comments, but you can find all opinions at
THANK_YOU: Thank you for being with us!

ABOUT_PAGE.TITLE: Our History And Passion
ABOUT_PAGE.SUBTITLE: The beauty of the past in the heart of the present times.
ABOUT_PAGE.MISSION_1: Salon Unikatów is a family business born from a passion for beauty, history and objects with a soul. We believe that antiques are more than decorations—they are stories, memories and a unique atmosphere you can bring into your home.
ABOUT_PAGE.MISSION_2: We want to share this passion by offering you unique items that combine aesthetics with history. Our goal is for every customer to feel they are receiving more than just an object—a piece of heritage.
ABOUT_PAGE.COLLECTION_ORIGIN_TITLE: Where Our Unique Items Come From
ABOUT_PAGE.COLLECTION_ORIGIN_1: Our collections are built through careful selection. We visit antique fairs, auction houses and private collections across Europe to find true gems.
ABOUT_PAGE.COLLECTION_ORIGIN_2: Every item that enters our salon undergoes thorough verification for authenticity, quality and condition. Only then does it become part of our offer—with the hope that it will become part of your collection.
ABOUT_PAGE.CHARACTERISTICS_1: We are a small business—and that gives us an edge. We offer a personalized approach to each customer, quick communication and full commitment to fulfilling orders.
ABOUT_PAGE.CHARACTERISTICS_2: We take care to ensure safe shopping: every item is packed with the utmost care to arrive in perfect condition. Customer satisfaction is our top priority—it drives us forward.
ABOUT_PAGE.QUOTE: "Every item has its own story. We help to tell it."

PRIVACY_POLICY_PAGE.TITLE: Privacy policy
PRIVACY_POLICY_PAGE.TITLE_2: 2. Collection and processing of personal data
PRIVACY_POLICY_PAGE.INTRODUCTION: Respecting the privacy rights of those visiting our website, Salon Unikatów makes every effort to adequately protect personal data. This privacy policy explains what data is collected and for what purpose it is processed.
PRIVACY_POLICY_PAGE.PARAGRAPH_1_1: The administrator of personal data collected via the website is:
PRIVACY_POLICY_PAGE.PARAGRAPH_2_1: Our website uses a contact form provided by an external service Web3Forms, which collects the following data: name and surname, e-mail address, message content. This data is processed solely for the purpose of responding to your inquiry sent via the contact form.
PRIVACY_POLICY_PAGE.PARAGRAPH_2_2: The contact form is operated via Web3Forms. User data may be processed by this entity in order to ensure the functionality of the form. More information on data processing by Web3Forms can be found in their
PRIVACY_POLICY_PAGE.PARAGRAPH_3_1: Our website contains links to the website
PRIVACY_POLICY_PAGE.PARAGRAPH_3_2: , where our auctions are located. By clicking on these links, you are redirected to an external site that has its own privacy policy. We recommend that you read the privacy policy of Allegro, available on their website, because Salon Unikatów has no influence on the way data is processed by this service.
PRIVACY_POLICY_PAGE.PARAGRAPH_4_1: Our website uses cookies to remember whether the user has already seen the information displayed in a modal window (pop-up). A cookie is a small text file stored in the user's browser that allows the website to recognize the user during subsequent visits.
PRIVACY_POLICY_PAGE.PARAGRAPH_4_2: The cookie related to the modal window does not contain any personal data and is used solely to improve the user experience by preventing the repeated display of the same information.
PRIVACY_POLICY_PAGE.PARAGRAPH_4_3: You can delete cookies at any time using your browser settings.
PRIVACY_POLICY_PAGE.PARAGRAPH_5_1: Data collected via the contact form may be shared with a third party – Web3Forms – to provide a messaging service. This data is not shared with other parties for marketing or commercial purposes.
PRIVACY_POLICY_PAGE.PARAGRAPH_6_1: Every user has the right to:
PRIVACY_POLICY_PAGE.PARAGRAPH_6_LIST_3: - request deletion of data ("right to be forgotten"),
PRIVACY_POLICY_PAGE.PARAGRAPH_6_LIST_5: - withdraw consent to data processing at any time.
PRIVACY_POLICY_PAGE.PARAGRAPH_6_2: To exercise these rights, please contact us via e-mail: salonnikatow@gmail.com.
PRIVACY_POLICY_PAGE.PARAGRAPH_7_1: We make every effort to ensure that your data is safe. Data sent via the contact form is protected by appropriate technical and organizational measures that are designed to prevent access by unauthorized persons.
PRIVACY_POLICY_PAGE.PARAGRAPH_8_1: Salon Unikatów reserves the right to make changes to this privacy policy. Any changes will be published on this page. Using our site after changes are made constitutes acceptance of the new privacy policy.
PRIVACY_POLICY_PAGE.CLOSURE: If you have any questions about our privacy policy, please contact us.
